rewardsInfo.description: You lift less than a grocery bag full of wet tissues. Honestly, are you made of air? Go touch a dumbbell‚Äîany dumbbell‚Äîeven the pink one your cat uses as a toy. You got potential‚Ä¶ somewhere.

Congrats‚Äîyou can probably bench your own ego! Too bad it weighs less than your lunch. Try lifting something heavier than your phone for once. Your Grandmas' Grandma is still stronger, you must do something with this beginning from yesterday

All you can? You are that type of person who asks his grandma to open toilet lid cos its too heavy when he goes to take a dump, decreasing his microscopic weight even more. Go eat and train fcking moron, albeit you're shit now, I believe in you.
You‚Äôre starting to look like a snack‚Äîliterally! Not quite a snack for gains, but getting there. Keep pushing; one day you might intimidate a pigeon. Almost to be a human but still not enough
Okay, now you‚Äôre cooking with gas‚Äîand by gas, I mean the fumes from your pre-workout. You‚Äôre halfway to being scary. Don‚Äôt get cocky‚Ä¶ but do get cockier after leg day.
Things are not so bad, still you can do way better. Go to gym and make me 20 squat reps with weight with which you usually do 10. Right now
You are perfection, my dear! Just try to keep being so beatiful and strong as long as you can to make this world a little nicer. Kissing you in all allowed (and mb not only) places üòòüíã
The gods whisper your name before attempting squats. Mountains crack when you flex. Keep flexing, keep grinding‚Äîyou‚Äôre not just strong, you‚Äôre a menace with good hygiene.

Gravity apologizes when you step on the scale. Normal humans avoid eye contact in the gym out of sheer awe. You‚Äôre not just peak human‚Äîyou‚Äôre the reason dumbbells exist. Bow down‚Ä¶ or better yet, spot me next set üòè
